name: Gold Man-no purchase,super fun
description:
Gold Man:
* Gold Man is a very popular online casual game, now officially landing iOS platform, I hope you like!
* Simple operation, in the process of hooking, aiming at gold, click on the screen will release the hook to grab gold.
* Multiple scenes, a variety of challenges, super fun
* Each game, each level of the map may be different, so every time the opening is a new challenge!
